ygData.subject: Galactic Arms Race Released
ygData.msgSnippet: I am pleased to announce that GAR is now released and available at: http://gar.eecs.ucf.edu As some of you know, GAR can be played single player or multiplayer

I am pleased to announce that GAR is now released and available at:

http:/=
/gar.eecs.ucf.edu

As some of you know, GAR can be played single player or =
multiplayer online.  In the multiplayer mode, the evolution of CPPN-control=
led weapons in the game is influenced by all the players online, making it =
(as far as I know) the first example of real online content evolution in a =
multiplayer game.  The algorithm is called cgNEAT, for content-generating N=
EAT.

Both game client and online server (for hosting your own galaxy) are =
available.  We are also hosting an official GAR server with high capacity b=
ecause of our fast connection at UCF.

This project was very complex, in ef=
fect involving the implementation of not just a game, but an online service=
 and a novel evolutionary algorithm, so there could be a few unanticipated =
hiccups in the first release, but I think you will find it entertaining and=
 interesting.

ken
